name: pi-webrtc-audio
description: WebRTC audio bridge for Raspberry Pi - handles audio input/output via ALSA and WebRTC peer connections

scripts.install-alsa: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y alsa-utils
scripts.test-audio: arecord -D plughw:3,0 -f S16_LE -r 48000 -c 1 -t wav -d 5 test.wav && aplay test.wav && rm test.wav

author: WebRTC Audio Bridge
